judges.name: Rochelle C. East
judges.title: Presiding Judge
judges.designation: Presiding Judge & Civil Master Calendar / Settlements
judges.bio: Former top administrator in the California Attorney General's Office and wartime Naval officer. First female Presiding Judge of Hispanic/Native American descent. Appointed by Gov. Jerry Brown in 2013.

education.law: University of San Francisco School of Law (J.D.)

judges.name: Charles F. Haines
judges.title: Judge
judges.bio: Judge presiding over housing and evictions cases. Known for rulings on eviction moratoriums and vacant property taxes.

judges.name: Richard B. Ulmer Jr.
judges.title: Judge
judges.bio: Former newspaper reporter who became a judge. Known for spare writing style and not frequently changing tentative rulings. Appointed by Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger in 2009.

judges.name: Monica F. Wiley
judges.title: Judge
judges.designation: Family Law / Unified Family Court Supervising Judge
judges.bio: Second African American female judge appointed to the San Francisco bench. Appointed by Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger in 2009. Supervising Judge of the Unified Family Court since 2018.

education.law: Howard University School of Law (J.D., Cum Laude, 1995)

judges.name: Victor M. Hwang
judges.title: Judge
judges.bio: Civil rights attorney with 25 years of experience before joining the bench. Known for expertise in hate crimes and human trafficking cases. Elected in 2016, took office January 2017.

notes: This directory contains basic information about San Francisco Superior Court judges from the Constants data found in the repository. Photos are being systematically collected and organized in the /public/judges directory.
